text:
Awalnya agak ragu untuk stay di Park 5, karena sering sekali melihat orang2 ngikutin trend staycation. Bukan apa2, pernah stay di sebuah hotel yang staycation abis, dan bener2 berisik, terlalu banyak tamu yang..sorry not sorry agak gimana gitu. Masalahnya saya dalam perjalanan keluarga sekaligus kerjaan, jadi memang butuh yang nyaman dengan rate affordable sekaligus paling dekat dengan lokasi acara. Akhirnya ya udah lah coba dulu.
Ternyata keraguan saya langsung hilang sejak masuk ke lobby Park 5, vibes-nya asik banget. Proses check in juga smooth, dibantu petugas Mas Dedy (Dudy, Budi apa Rudy, ya?). Stay tanggal 10-12 Februari 2023, untuk kamar Standard dan Superior.
Sepanjang di Park 5, rasanya saya sangat menikmati suasana hotel ini. Nggak berisik, ambiance yang nyaman dan musik mid-tempo yang terus terdengar adalah hal2 yang saya nikmati selain tentu saja kamar. Untuk kamar Standard saya pikir lebih dari ekspektasi, ya. Begitu juga dengan bathroom. Sedangkan kamar Superior juga dibuat sangat lebih. Untuk breakfast juga ok, selain yang ready ada menu by request.
Saya bahkan memutuskan untuk extend satu malam, 12-13 Februari 2023, dibantu oleh petugas Mbak Sinta (Anggi, Chyntia atau siapa ya?). Di hari terakhir saya baru sadar, hotel ini semacam hidden gem, berasa sedang di daerah2 sepi Bali seperti Nusa Dua. Nggak berasa di daerah yang sebenernya kepleset aja nyampe TB Simatupang dan sekitarnya yang rame dan macet.
Check out juga sangat lancar, dibantu petugas Mas Rifky (Fikry, Rizky atau siapa gitu). Keseluruhan saya sangat menikmati stay di Park 5. Semua petugas front office/reception, F&B, cafe (Rantang, ya?) sampai housekeeping bener2 ramah dan sopan. Enak banget loh ngeliat orang2 pada ramah.
Nah, untuk petugas keamanan mungkin perlu sedikit "dipoles", ya. Karena mixed nih, ada yang ramah ada yang biasa aja. Lagian ini kan hotel, ya. Jangan seperti bertugas di instansi yang mungkin perlu sedikit kaku. Lagian keamanan itu front liner, loh.
Mudah2an sih Park 5 bisa terus mempertahankan semua hal positive yang saya rasakan, dan meningkatkan kekurangan yang saya dan reviewer lain rasakan.
title: Semacam Hidden Gem.

text:
Pengalaman pertama untuk staycation for work di Jakarta, yang sangat tidak diduga. Harusnya di dalam era C19 kala ini, pengelolaan kebersihan sanitasi dan atensi untuk keselamatan dan kenyaman menjadi PERHATIAN utama dari pihak management. 

Housekeeping Supervisor bernama Fepta menurut saya sangat disayangkan dengan lack of knowledge dalam menata kamar yang seharusnya menjalankan protocol kesehatan dengan mengetahui kondisi kamar yang dirapihkan oleh Room Boy. 

Di kamar saya terdapat bed sheet, cover duvet, pillow cover yang hanya dirapihkan tidak diganti dari tamu sebelumnya, hal ini sangat disayangkan dan siapa pun tidak mau tidur di kamar yang tidak diganti dari orang yg sebelumnya tidak dikenal.

Pihak Management terlalu slow response, dengan jawaban dari Hadi FO supervisor yang mengatakan tidak ada manager on duty, padahal seharusnya pihak management perlu turun langsung menyaksikan hal yang dapat merusak reputasi pelayanan dari Hotel ini. terkhusus bagi tamu2 yang tidak paham membedakan mana cover2 yang hanya dirapihkan atau diganti. saya berharap dari review ada perbaikan kedepannya agar tidak ada tamu tamu lain yang dirugikan ataupun dibahayakan. Dan alangkah baiknya karena saya melihat hotel ini kekurangan man power, agar temen - teman yang inging menginap dihotel ini, minta kembali untuk mengganti semua yang ada di kamar.

Terakhir yang saya tidak bisa terima adalah, Fepta yang sedang me"mop" lantai kamar saya karena untuk finalisasi dibersihkan, mencuci mop tersebut di Wastafel yang mana menurut saya tidak seharusnya dicuci di wastafel.

Park 5 Please do re-training all your staff especially in guest service and how to work professionally. Akhirnya kata juga mengucapkan terima kasih ke Ibu Anis selalu manager houskeeping yang akhirnya menemui saya walaupun sangat sangat terlambat.
title: Unprofessional Service during Covid Season

text:
Menginap 4 malam di hotel ini karena ada kegiatan di RS Fatmawati. Bisa ke RS Fatmawati dengan berjalan kaki sekitar 15 menit. Cilandak Town Square sekitar 15 menit berjalan kaki juga. 
Kami datang sekitar jam 9.30 pagi, jadi belum bisa check in. Namun resepsionis membantu proses registrasi terlebih dahulu dan barang kami tinggal di concierge. Pelayanan resepsionis cepat dan ramah. Juga menyampaikan bahwa di dalam kamar terdapat minuman air mineral botol besar yang berbayar, sementara untuk complementary mineral water diletakkan di dalam kamar mandi. 
Kamar memang berukuran agak kecil, namun masih OK. Penerangan kamar agak sedikit remang-remang. 
Kamar mandi cukup bersih, hanya dinding kamar mandi di samping kloset ada kotoran yang sejak kami datang sampai keluar di hari ke-5, tetap belum dibersihkan. Saya memang sengaja tidak melaporkan hal tersebut, karena ingin melihat bagaimana ketelitian cleaning service kamar. 
TV kabel menggunakan U See TV dari Telkom. Pilihan channel cukup banyak. Kecepatan internet bagus. Nilai 7,5 dari 10.
Air panas berfungsi dengan baik, kecuali bila terlalu pagi, sebelum jam 6,air panas belum berjalan dengan baik, hanya terasa sedikit hangat, namun tidak mencukupi. Padahal 3 hari kami harus bangun dan mandi di jam 5.30 pagi. Di hari ke-3, saya menyampaikan keluhan ini dan ditangani dengan baik. Kami bisa mandi dengan air panas yang nyaman di hari terakhir kami. 
Untuk malam hari, air panas berfungsi normal. 
Sarapan pagi menunya cukup beragam. Apresiasi untuk 1 orang waitress wanita yang berjaga di pagi hari (saya tidak tahu namanya), 3 kali saya memesan telur mata sapi dan omelete dengan kualifikasi yang berbeda, namun semuanya dapat dipahami dan disiapkan dengan benar. Bubur ayam enak. Jus buah walau hanya 1 macam, namun berbeda setiap hari. 
Proses check out cepat dan tidak bertele-tele. 
Secara umum pelayanan yang diberikan baik. Justru masalah terletak pada hal yang berkaitan dengan fasilitas. 
Di depan hotel ada ATM Bank Mandiri.

text:
Saya menginap semalam di hotel ini karna lokasinya yang tidak terlalu jauh dengan lokasi pernikahan temen baik saya.

Dari segi lokasi, menurutku lumayan strategis ya. Untuk mencapai hotel ini, kita harus memasuki lorong. Gak butuh waktu lama dari depan lorong untuk mencapai tempat ini. Hotel ini terletak di sebelah kanan jalan. Mengapa saya bilang lumayan startegis? Karna pas seberang lorong masuknya adalah Cilandak Town Square. Mall yang dimana kamu bisa menemukan apa saja. Sayangnya, sedang ada pembangunan tol (?), yg menyebabkan perjalanan dari citos ke hotel membutuhkan waktu 2x lebih lama dari perjalanan hotel menuju citos.

Dari segi kamar, aku sukaaa konsepnya. Kamarnya lumayan luas. Dengan toilet yang sangat bersih. Amenities serba abu-abu. Sandalnya juga abu-abu. Sepertinya kalo handuk hotelnya diganti warna abu-abu jadi lebih keren juga deh 🤔
Yang agak kurang menurutku adalah tirai yg menutupi kaca antara kamar mandi dan kamar. Di kamarku sendiri, tirainya gak bisa menutup sempurna. Jadi masih ada kosong sekitar 5cm. Aku coba ngintip dari bed dan ak masih bisa melihat isi kamar mandi. Entah ini hanya di kamarku aja atau mmg semua kamarnya seperti ini.
Oiya, kamarku sendiri viewnya ke arah kolam renang. Ada balkonnya 😍i luv it.

Dari segi makanan, aku sih cocok dengan rasanya. Lumayan lengkap juga menurutku.

title: Hotel nyaman cocok untuk beristirahat dengan harga bersahabat

text: Kedua kalinya menginap di Park 5. Hotel dengan bed yang nyaman, balkon menghadap kolam, wifi yang cepat. Harga affordable. Sempat khawatir saat musim hujan dikarenakan beberapa daerah banjir. Sehingga menelefon dahulu dan diinfokan dengan baik oleh resepsionis bahwa Park 5 bebas banjir. Recommended hotel.
title: Affordable price, good sleep

text:
Hotelnya nyaman, cozy dan jauh dari keramaian. Design  interior hotel  dan kamarnya minimalis, ukuran kamar lumayan besar, kasurnya juga nyaman. Breakfast nya lumayan, sayang chanel tv nya kurang byk
Overall valued for money, already booked for new years eve.
title: Nyaman dan Jauh dari Keramaian

text:
Kebetulan waktu saya menginap disini saya ikutan promo dari p*gip*gi.com jadi lumayan mengurangi budget :) Saya dapat kamar no 515, balkon menghadap ke tanah kosong arah RS Fatmawati.

Room 515
+ Sama sekali tidak terdengar suara bising mobil/motor lewat
+ Kamarnya bersih, tidak bau, rapiiii...
+ Yang saya suka adalah posisi AC yang anginnya tidak menghadap ke kasur *LOVE IT*
+ Kamar mandi bersih, simple, berfungsi semua maksimal (hot/cold), saluranair (wastafel&shower) tidak mampet
+ Tersedia peralatan mandi mini + handuk + sendal hotel
+ WIFI? Sinyal penuh, karena setiap kamar dilengkapi satu modem wifi *COOL*
- Suara orang lewat dari depan pintu sangat terdengar
- Suara orang tertawa kencang dari kamar sebelah juga terdengar :)

Breakfast is simple but variative.. Waktu saya menginap sarapannya ada Buah-buahan, Sereal, bubur ayam, soto ayam, nasi putih, ayam asam-manis, tumis brokoli, kentang, omelet yang dipesan, sosis goreng, roti panggang dg selai madu+strawberry, juice orange, air putih. :D

Ada Gym dan Pool tapi saya tidak sempat mencobanya...

Terima kasih Park 5 Hotel sudah menyediakan penginapan yang terjangkau dengan kualitas yang tidak mengecewakan... :) Sering lewat sini akhirnya bisa menginap juga.
title: Feel Like Home

text:
Dengan rate yg mereka berikan, saya mendapatkan kenyamanan yang lebih dari yg saya bayarkan. 

Kamar luas.. tempat tidur dan bantalnya sangat nyaman

Room service sangat responsive dan cepat saji. Mutu makanannya baik, walaupun terbilang sedikit mahal. 

Staff sangat ramah
title: "Simple tapi nyaman"

text:
Lagi iseng liat instagram tiba-tiba muncul iklan Park5, kebetulan sekali memang lg cari hotel yang unik dan lucu. Setelah saya browsing, saya langsung tertarik untuk mencoba menginap disana. Desain hotel yang kekinian dan sangat instagramable :p

Pelayanan nya sangat baik, para pegawainya pun ramah-ramah. Kamarnya sangat nyaman dan bersih, cocok juga untuk pasangan yang baru menikah, dan yang lebih menyenangkan lagi ternyata makanan untuk sarapan rasanya enak-enak 

Recommended hotel!!
title: Hotel Tersembunyi Yang Menarik

text:
Berada di pinggiran kota Jakarta Selatan, hotel ini cocok buat anda yang ingin staycation tanpa ingin diganggu suara bising jalanan.

check in berjalan cepat, dapat kamar di lantai 5 dengan balkon dan pool view, saat masuk kamar saya kaget karena kamarnya bagus, minimalis dan nyaman. Kamarnya tidak sempit, kamar mandinya juga gak sempit.

Paginya saya coba berenang dan kolamnya bersih tapi sayang kalau mau minta handuk harus panggil petugas dulu.

Untuk harga sekitar 400k saya bisa bilang hotel ini adalah hotel yang sangat baik dengan fasilitas yang lengkap, sinyal wifi cukup kencang dan untuk anda yg merokok cukup matikan AC dan buka jendela kamar.
title: Home Sweet Home

text:
Cuma semalam di sini dan enak untuk bersantai.

Kelebihan:
- Kamar lumayan luas, desain menarik
- TV besar
- Ada balkon yang bisa dibuka kalau ingin merokok
- Wifi bagus dengan koneksi yang baik
- Sarapannya enak-enak (Disarankan untuk memesan kamar dengan paket sarapannya. Sangat worth it)
- Staff ramah dan membantu

Kekurangan:
- Kamar saya AC-nya sempat bocor / berair sehingga lantai basah
title: Nice stay

text: Hotelnya terletak di kawasan yang cukup tenang dan nyaman, dekat dengan RS Fatmawati dan Citos. Kamar yang dipesan tidak termasuk sarapan, tetapi dari pihak hotel diberikan bonus sarapan untuk 1 orang.
title: Dapat bonus sarapan

text: Lokasi tidak terlalu di dekat jalan utama, jadi tidak terlalu ramai. Cocok untuk benar-benar beristirahat. Kamar, wifi, breakfast sangat memuaskan. Tapi yang agak kurang kalau kita mau mandi waktu malem dan subuh, air panasnya tidak terlalu panas. Atau mesin pemanasnya belum dinyalakan ya? tapi overall memuaskan
title: Hotel yang jauh dari hirup pikuk Jakarta

text: Favorite place, untuk mendapatkan pool side harus booking dari jauh jauh hari. Lokasi hotel tidak jauh dan tidak begitu ramai. Parkiran sangat luas karena memiliki basement sendiri. Sungguh pilihan yang sangat tepat
title: Pool Side

text: Harga yang ditawarkan cukup terjangkau dan lokasinya juga mudah diakses. Restoran nya dapat digunakan untuk pesta ulang tahun dalam skala kecil dengan undagan sekitar 50 orang. Kamar dan sarapan paginya termasuk standard.
title: Hotel Nyaman dengan Harga Terjangkau

text: Sudah 2 kali menginap di sini dan akan kembali lagi. Lokasinya bagus bagi yang bepergian di daerah Jakarta Selatan. Kamar lapang, tempat parkir luas, wifi kencang, dan menu sarapan cukup variatif. Staff ramah dan cekatan.
title: Value for money

text: The hotel has modern and minimalist design. Has a small size pool and gym. Convinient store is 5 minutes car distance. Need to improve the hotel staff that was not friendly and the breakfast is below average.
title: Modern and minimalist hotel

text:
Park 5 Hotel has been an awesome home away from home experience for me. Industrial styled interior, spacious and firm bed, clean bathroom (the glass window detail is cool), 24 hour room service, smart tv entertainment and high speed wifi connection (private wifi router for every room!). The food is good and the restaurant is great for a get together. The staff are friendly and helpful, making sure for a comfortable stay. I'm definitely coming back the next time I visit Jakarta!

P.S. This hotel is recommended for people who wants to stay in the South area of Jakarta near Pondok Indah, Fatmawati, Kemang, Cipete and Blok M. Suitable for a stay away from all the buzziness in the centre. It's a cozy hotel of medium size, so those who are not really into huge hotels for the masses or busy traffic streets, this hotel is definitely a must go!
title: Home away from home

photos.caption: Open closet system for suitcase, clothes and shoes.

text: I came here with my friend. The place is so comfortable, the receptionist is very friendly and helpful. So interesting place to stay. The room is also not too small. The gym and pool are pleasant enough. Suitable for overnight stay
title: Very comfortable

text:
I stayed at this hotel for several times and  for sure I'll coming back. 
The location its not too far from the main street, easy to find. The staff was very helpful and nice. The room and the bathroom was spacious and clean. I've tried the room service, pizza and chicken wings. It tastes really good! I recommended the pizza.  TV channel was good. There aren't so many choices for the breakfast but it taste quite good. 
The signal in the lobby and room not so good, but there's wifi. 
I wish they could provide 2 bottles 600 ml mineral water. 
The aisle and lift are quite hot. 
But i love this hotel!!
title: Very comfortable.

text: We stay 2 nights here to attend my friend wedding.The hotel is off the main road and quite secluded. The buffet breakfast here was good and hotel design is simple and nice. However I was upset about the service because it took me 4 times to call before I get an iron.I requested from 9 pm and only got it around 8.30 am in the morning.They say the do nit have any iron left and if I want it I can send for pressing. They should have told me the night before that they do not provide iron or their policy is like that.Overall it is an ok place if you wanna stay for short trip.
title: Jakarta Short Trip

text: I Stay for a night with family, The hotel very quite and just minutes away to citos mall..the room was huge with urban interior style and my room have an Direct accses to pool kids love to swim in the afternoon, the hotel architecture bring dark theme with  urban and industrial concept..TV channel a bit Hard to understand..luckly there ia a youtube access oN TV that make the Child Win the TV remote..breakfast Food was Ok, .but need a minutes to Wait for the table ( Its maybe the resto quite small )..love the pouridge and the staff fill the empty food quickly...a few people saw ate at lobby..Staff was friendly..especially The housekeeping and Front office..the HK staff knock the room at 8am to ask weather I have loundry or not..but i Think instead just Only ask an empty laundry it also better to Remind the bfast Time or inform any other related to facilities or any other guest needs..overall I love to Stay here and in occasionaly I Will cor back to Stay at This hotel..
title: Nice and Cozy room

text: With only 171 rooms..relatively small but truly convenient. The bathroom is quite big and the room is standard. The breakfast is nice while the roomrate is moderate. The location itself is quite tranquil..yet easy to reach. Mall and hospital nearby..and also public facilities. Worth a visit.
title: Small but convenient..

text: Spend 2 nite during idul fitri. The staff accommodated our request and being helpful without being over the top. Room is clean and bed comfortable. The water pressure is average but hot water always available even during peak occupancy. The swimming pool is on chilly side but good nevertheless. Breakfast is good and coffee is decent. The area close approximately to the city center but on residential area so its quite which good for resting. Its a hidden gem and for the price i couldn't recommended more..keep it up guys
title: Comfortable stay

text: Nice warm welcome from all staff .we directly enjoy the pool and fitness center for fun. the next morning with good taste breakfast specially fresh fruit salad..thanks park5..it's well recommended stay for weekend in Jakarta instead of horrible weekend outside town.
title: Nice weekend with my Family

text:
So, here is my second review about this place. Came here for the second time on 14th may. I just stayed 1 night this time (last time 3 nights) with breakfast included this time (last time, without breakfast). This place is still really good, you have your own wifi router in your room, so you don't need to share a same wifi with other guest. This time, they have a problem with TV channel, like you can't watch FOX Movies, HBO, and other popular channel this time. I don't know what the problem is, maybe because of the channel subscription. But, it's not a problem for me this time, I was so tired and didn't have any intention to watch TV either, so it's okay.
About the breakfast, it was really good. Food variant is okay for this range of price, it also taste good in my opinion. But, one thing that amazed me was the coffee. You need to ask them for coffee if you want, and they will brew it for you. It's a fresh brew from coffee machine, and it's not an instant coffee. It's quiet unique for me. :)
For around 530.000 rupiah, it's really worth every penny.:D
title: Superb as always

text: Nice visit and i got best price offer from agoda through tripadvisor. Recommended for those who wants to find a feels-like-home experience around Jakarta Area. Yet at the time of my stay, the pool is quiet dirty.
title: First timer

text:
I stayed at hotel just one night (11-12 March 2017). All is good. I arrived at hotel at 1 AM and the front staff is very helpful and friendly. I mostly like the breakfast even it was simple but the food is delicious. 
If I come back again to Jakarta, I recommended this hotel for budget hotel with a good service and food.
title: Clean and Nice Simply Hotel

text:
nice and simpe budget hotel. the hotel is close to cilandak town square. the hotel also have nice simple swimming pool. you can choose the room in 1st floor if you want to have the pool right in front of your terace door. 
they also have dine in room service, and the menu was quite nice. The pizza was good.
title: simple and nice hotel

text: For approx 350,000 rupiah per night, you can get a spacious room with great selection of breakfast food. Located in a quiet area near main road, my staying experience feels really private but still familiar. Love it.
title: Great for its value

text: This is the best hotel in this price range in Jakarta and is even better than most of the more expensive hotels in Jakarta. The restaurant is good, rooms are great and even has a swimming pool and fitness room. Each room as it's own WiFi router with decent speed Internet and many TV channels. The rooms at the second level are nice, particularly rooms next to the pool. They have a sliding door that opens to the pool. So you can set next to the pool or straight from your room jump into the pool.
title: Excellent hotel with great value for money

text:
Park 5 is a new hotel so d room is still new, nice with modern designed n complete cable tv channel, but is 2 dark if u need 2 work in room...
They have a small gym and a pool but i dont have time to try it.
Breakfast is good but d cafe shop is quite small.
title: Modern n simple room

text: Stayed here for one night and I'd definitely stay here again for another trip. Smooth check in and check out process. The room is clean and comfy. The staff are helpful and friendly but the front staff needs to be friendlier.
title: Convenient stay

text: Stayed a night in this new hotel which is located in a residential area, Our cab driver had a difficult time to locate the hotel on arrival and so did the others that came to pick us up for our trip across town. The location is far from central but the well designed hotel made up for it. The owners I met were helpful.
title: Good Stay

text:
Can't count how many time stay at this place. It's my favorite since near from my home. Some staff familiar with my family already. They kept good service.
As I described it before, it is not big fancy hotel but almost all you need provided.
Since last year they have studio room and bigger than standard room.
title: Still love the place

text: This is one hotel that I wanted to sleep in for quite some time, based on reviews. A simple hotel located in quite hidden neighbourhood. Check in is fast. Step in to the room and wooow, the (standard) room is very spacious, warm, and simple. Wooden floor, wooden desk, wooden cabinet. Comfortable bed dan bedding. Bathroom with rainfall shower, clean and equipped with necessary toilettries. Swimming pool is quite big, clean, with adequate depth. Breakfast is simple, but delicious. Unfortunately, the dining area is quite small for a hotel that big. Overall, a highly recommended hotel.
title: An enjoyable stay...

text: The hotel was good at all. Cozy room with the good view, already slept here for 2 times. But for breakfast is just 3,2 of 5, need to do some variety for the menu. The tv remote was awful, it was hard to click the number (every time i went here) but overall i love being here.
title: Full review

text: The room is spacious and nice. Spent 4 days 3 nights, and find no problem with this hotel except the room is not so clean and this place is kinda far from the central of business district. There were lots of ants in my room, and I have no idea where did it comes from. But overall, it's a really good place to stay. :)
title: Cozy but not so clean

text: 2 night at this hotel, it's nice, clean, the room was comfy enough, but air con not cold, and we just complain and the staff quick to repair that, but it doesnt work well, so tomorrow we change the room, breakfast was average, and we try to dine and the food was so so, because there is no food court or restaurant around the hotel, the hotel was a bit far from the main street, it's was good for the person who just to take a rest and do the work full day
title: Good

text:
Me and my best friend wanna spent girls sleepover at hotel.
We talk and laugh all night. It was new hotel. scent of new interior can be smell. New York style hotel. The room was cozy and comfortable. The food at hotel restaurant absolutely delicious. our favorite was roasted chicken with mashed potato. happy tummy, indeed.
in addition, The hotel facilitated with small gym and swimming pool.
title: Cool and Cozy Hotel

text: Great stay so far. Nice stylish cosy room. Wife really liked the design. Lobby restaurant opens until 10 PM. Will try the outdoor pool on the second floor tomorrow. First time here. Won't be the last, for sure.
title: Lovely First Impression

text:
I stay here for 3 nights. The room is nice with great design. Love the breakfast! The staff is very helpful and friendly, it makes me feel comfortable.

The location is good for me because it's close to the place I need to go. 

Overall I have a great time staying at Park 5 and would recommend this place to other traveler.
title: Comfortable

text:
My husband and I wanted to stay for a night in hotel and Park 5 Hotel seems like a nice choice. It was indeed, but I think I'd like to add some notes. 

+ Cool interior design (very Instagram-able) 😍
+ Clean & neat
+ Super friendly staffs, they greet happily with warm smile, anytime
+ Fast check in/out
+ Hot shower was perfect 
+ Breakfast was good and tasty 
+ Good deal of rate
+ Good wi fi

- 2nd floor hallway smells like wet carpet 
- Lack of amenities. I was expecting they provide sandals and toothbrush since I didn't bring them but one of the housekeeping staff said they're running out of stock when I was asking (And seems I couldn't find mini-stores nearby to buy them). Oh well. 
- The bed was a bit too hard for me and pillows felt too soft. But since each person has their own preference of bed, I guess not a big deal.

If you like a quiet hotel that slightly far from the highway noise, you might consider to stay here.
title: Fine for a short stay

text: i like to stay in this hotel. its very new, clean, has a very nice interior design. the staff are friendly and helpful... i stayed for couple times for business matters, and will definitely come back to this hotel if i ever need to.. also the TV channel and Wifi are great!
title: Nice New Hotel

text:
It is just a small hotel. Till now still little finishing some parts of the hotel. Pool is small, resto is small too, but it's ok since small hotel. Will have new rooms (two bed room suite) in the future. Room to sleep is OK, not too small.
Recommended if you want to have reasonable price with good place to stay.
title: Small hotel but good place to stay

text: this hotel is new, but there was no sign. since it wasn't located precisely in google map, I missed this hotel and I had to turn back. thank god it was the only high building at that road. the room was fine, clean, smelt like new furnitures. the caesar salad was tasty. the wifi was fast. but when I try to sleep (maybe at 8 pm), I could clearly hear sound like somebody was hitting the wall with hammer over and over again. it was so disturbing. overall, it was so worth it. definitely gonna stay there again someday.
title: good place to stay

text:
I stayed at this hotel for 4 days 3 nights. Found this new hotel from agoda, and convinced that this new hotel was great. 
In my opinion : 
Plus points :
1. New room, new facilities, with clean and neat room
2. Helpful staffs
3. Location was absolutely amazing. Love it.
4. Lots of TV channels and their wifi was fast
Disappointed by : 
1. Very, very poor security system, especially at their basement. No one stay there. So, if you have problems or difficulties there, you have to reach lobby first to get help. 
When we stay there, we park our motorcycle at basement with double lock. At first, no problem at all. But on the day 3, we found that one bolt from my motorcycle license plate was missing. We already report this matter to the hotel, but until we left, no further explanation nor apology maybe ?
2. Breakfast was actually OK. Some of the food even taste great. But the food choice (variation), availability (you will found lots of empty plates when you are late for breakfast), and their service needs some serious and lots of improvement. 
Suggestion :
1. Please provide room for smoker (smoking room), or at least provide and ashtray at the balcony so we can trash our cigarette but properly. 
2. Please place 1 security or staff at the basement. It is quite spooky at night and I cannot imagine if something happened there. This person will also help in guarding the vehicles, to avoid any other unnecessary things to happened.
title: Great new hotel, but... (with lots of notes)

text:
Actually, Park 5 is a good hotel. I as millenial like the design.
I also love the foods. It was delicious. I ordered nasi gandul sapi when it was rained, and it was delicious! Then I also ate chicken wings and tempe mendoan, alsk the bottled coffee. The taste were good. Super love it!
Ah once more that I love this hotel.
The mosque isn't that near, so for Friday prayer (Jumatan), they provide shuttle car to deliver guests to mosque, and it was magnificent!

I asked the fo, the occupation already close to normal. Even the cafe/coffeeshop also full, which is great in this pandemic situation. Therefore I assumed that this hotel/management think they don't need to have a great service, because without having it, their occupancy is already full, so does the cafe. Am I wrong? I hope I'm wrong ☺️.

My booked was on Thu-Fri, Nov 25-26.
Why did I have that assumption?
1. I did a stupid mistake, I booked in the wrong date. Supposed to be Wed-Thu, but I booked for Thu-Fri. The fo at that time, he wasn't very nice. Well, I know that was my mistake, but he treated me like... "Well that's yout mistake, if you want to refund, just call Agoda, not us!"

Then I went to the other place that night because Park 5 at that time was fully occupied for regular one. And that person said that the available room was only one Bedroom Suite, so what for?

Because I couldn't refund it, I called Park 5 and asked:
Me (M): can I have early checkin tomorrow?
Fo: Yes, but there's gonna be charge.
M: How much?
Fo: It depends on room type.
M: it's okay, how much for my room?
Fo: It depends on room type (repetition).
M: Yes, and how much?
Fo: For 11am, 150k, 10am 200k.

And by  Thursday (tomorrow) morning I came to Pak 5, did early check-in, and when the FO (different shift with the fo last night) said did I already know about charge, I said yes. And when I intend to typed my pin on edc, it became 250k! Then I complained based on my called last night, and it was still 200k then.

2. They gave 1 card. My assumption, when the hotel only gave 1 card, usually the card on the wall can be replaced by any card, but not at Park 5. So when I went down to take my Gofood order, I came to fo, and she said that there would be deposit 50k, I didn't bring my wallet, and no info when I checkedin, so the solution was the security accompanied me to access my room.
It's not about the money, but it's about service.

3. This hotel provide 2 water bottled Le Minerale. Not 600ml, but 330 ml one. Not enough? Chill. They provide another  2 Le Minerale 1,5l, for 20k/1 bottle.
I know you want make money from this, but honestly this thing made me  uncomfy. But that's from my perspective, maybe the other guest doesn't mind with it.

That was my 3 reason why I assumed like that.
Basically it was nice hotel. You should come and try by yourself, not based from my perspective. 
But I don't think i will have another staycation here..🙂
Unless they change their service.
Good luck Park 5..
title: Park 5: A Millenial Design Hotel With Less Service (In My Perspective)

text:
1. It was located in the residential areas alongside the citizen’s houses. But, it was near the main roadway (one way only), and the roadway itself was split by the toll-road. It could be accessed by various public transportation such as Transjakarta, MRT, even Minibuses (Angkot). But, I had to go outside that residential area to go to the street foods, minimarkets or shopping malls.
2. The room was spacious and cozy. I booked a Standard Room with a Queen-size bed. The interior design reminded me of the American classic style with woods and bricks, color-dominated with brown and white. The working desk was located at the corner of the room, by the side of the window. It had an open compartments near the entrance to put the clothes and luggage instead of a closed-doors cupboard, which made us easier to place/hang and take our stuff. The window itself could be opened, so we could enjoy the fresh air up on the balcony which offered a quiet and peaceful view. Unfortunately, the bed sheet and blanket were a bit dusty. 
3. The bathroom was quite large, and it had a window with a curtain separating the bathroom and the bedroom. The sink was in between the toilet and the shower tube. The hose-spray attached to the toilet flowed a high power of water, which personally I like. The rain shower couldn’t be adjusted, and there was no faucet nor hosed shower inside the bath tube. 
4. The restaurant was located on the first floor in front of the lobby. It wasn’t quite spacious, but it was so cozy to have a meal or hang out with friends. It was more like a cafe or bistro rather than a restaurant. It offered not only a breakfast in the morning for the hotel’s guests, but also offered a lunch meal, dinner, and even some snacks and beverages for both hotel’s guests and cafe’s regular visitors. That morning, I was called by one of the staff asking about the breakfast menu I’d like to have, then they delivered it to my room directly. Perhaps it was done to limit the amount of people in the restaurant in this New Normal Transition. 
5. All the staff were so nice, polite, warm, helpful, and smiled all the time. I’d like to have another night or two there again, perhaps by the side of the pool.
title: A Peaceful Place

text:
For me, this my favorite hotel in Jakarta. I've stayed here for almost 10 times in the past year or so. 

The location of the hotel is rather private thus create a quiet and exclusive feeling when you are inside. The design is just lovely, the modern, industrialist design just suited my taste, and I believe many people. The staffs are super friendly and accommodating, another reason this place is just perfect.

The room itself is really nice. Well equipped with smart cable tv, it should do fine for a nice staycation. The design of the room is really good as well, tho maybe a safety box can be useful.

The breakfast was nice too. The restaurant isn't the biggest, but it should suit the guest well.

Overall, I've stayed here almost almost 10 times, and will definitely continue to stay here again in the future.
title: My Go-To Place for Staycation

text:
Went here with my lovely wife and 6 years old kid for lunch on a cloudy weekend getaway.

Pleasant place, nice restaurant with elegant atmosphere, beautiful and helpul waitress Riyanti guided us through a selection of marvelous items on the menu.

Ordered marvelously delicious dishes, enjoyed my Chicken Terriyaki very much throughout the entire meal: Crispy deep-ried chicken with seaweed slices and genuine, Japanese-style terriyaki sauce, rice with nice black seaweed sprinkles, perfectly combined with spicy topping salad and tasty, hot miso soup.

Awesome place, memorable experience.

I spend 2 nights  for staycation  to do work.. The bathroom is quite clean and the soap and shampoo smell good which is my favorite (smells of green tea). In room I can find a set of tea, coffee, sugar, creamer along with a heating pot. There is also mineral water 1L but it's in charge which is I don't like it and pretty shame. 

I got back view and there is nothing to see and very dark when its night. The pool not really clean, because many leaves fell in that pool; also not given chlorine which is useful as a virus prevention.

They have gym fasilitation, also clean. Public toilet, lobby, restaurants, really love it so comfy, with wood nuances and aglonema ornamental plants along the lobby. 

The hotel very near with Cilandak Town Square, and other food station so I'm not worry when I'm hungry. Lots of choices!

I was asking for permission to bring out one old magazine but the staff refused to give me. I needed that magazine because there was an article that I really interested in.

They said that the hotel owner would not allow to bring the magazine. Well I thought it was just an old un-used magazine..not a proper collection of books. I do not think that the hotel owner would care about an old magazine. At that time actually I could just bring the magazine without their permission but I just did not feel right, so I asked for the permission.

I hope the staff will be upgraded for a better hospitality attitude, initiative and services to provide a better experience for the guest. 

There was no price for an unused magazine, but it would be priceless for the guest.

text:
True to all the past reviews here, Park 5 is a really good stay in Jakarta.

Peaceful surrounding, nice rooms, a chic restaurant downstairs, and also friendly and adequate service from the front desk. 

I like the nice hipster vibes decor in the hotel and the food from the restaurant is nice. We arrived rather early in the morning and as the rooms were not ready for check-in yet, but we find that it was cosy to just chill at the lobby area where you can order food from the restaurant. 

All in all it is a nice pleasant hotel to stay out for a few nights if you plan to visit Jakarta.
title: Had a really nice stay

text:
I just have time to write a review about this hotel.
I stayed here for 3 days 2 nights during Idul Fitri holidays in June. A quiet reception welcomed us when we checked in. The process was quick and a staff escorted us to our room, but we later changed the room because the window had no view. They exchanged our room to a better view but poorer room condition because there's a blotch on the wall caused by humidity from the bathroom. I just wondered why they didn't paint that wall.
A strange bad smell also hit me everytime I walked on the hallway. I think the carpet needed to be change and the wall needed repainted, because it looked shabby and old, not compatible with the room's concept. The pool outside was also dirty, so that we cancelled our swimming plan. Too bad!
The breakfast here was good, although not so many variety. It's acceptable though, since the hotel's rate was relatively cheap. Not many budget hotels offered the same quality for the food. The room service was also good, the food taste was outstanding, especially the Spaghetti Bolognese.
The staff was helpful and quick. A staff even helped us finding the taxi, which was very difficult at that time.
Overall, it was pleasant stay with some minor dissatisfaction. I hope right now the management has already improved a lot.
title: A Hidden Gem which needs to be polished a bit

値段も安く、必要最低限のアメニティもありましたが、ドライヤーが無かったのが気になりました。
朝食も種類は多くはありませんが味は悪くなく、2泊しましたがメニューも日によって少し変わっていました。
部屋はシンプルな造りですが、清潔感もあり特に問題ありませんでした。
フロントの対応も良く全体的には満足です。
無料のペットボトルの水が2本ありました。服のクリーニング等は見た限りだとサービスはやっていないかもしれません。
少し大通りから外れていますので、夜も静かでしたのでゆっくりされたい方には良いと思います。
title: 値段も手ごろでよいです
